channel.title: Npc will tele you to an area
channel.description: Ok so i want to make a member area and i want to make it so you have to talk to an npc and it will move you if u have the rights 6? im not sure how to do this

item.title: Npc will tele you to an area
item.dc:creator: @Skiire Skiire
item.description:
@Skiire wrote:

Create the dialogue, then in whatever case is for the teleport do something like this:

case DIALOGUE_ID:
if(c.playerRights == 6) {
sendNpcChat("You're teleported to wherever.");
c.dialogueAction == ACTION_ID;
c.nextChat = -1;
break;
} else {
sendStatement("You do not have a high enough rank to do that.");
c.nextChat = -1;
break;
}

Then within your clickingbuttons class add the move player part (you could do it within the dialogue itself too, this is just a personal preference)

NOTE: Ignore conventions, I did this in the reply box.

Read full topic
item.source: Npc will tele you to an area
